title: Why is Kled never in any lore besides his own?
body: You’d think with the Noxus and Ionia lore updates, Kled would be at least mentioned in the Ionian wars, as he has been in every Noxian campaign ever and achieved every rank in the Noxian military. But, with every lore update, there is no mention of Kled; not even Swains visual update hinted Kled. Is he too hard to incorporate into lore? I mean he is your average PTSD stricken war vet paranoid about the invisible brain weasels.

replies.body:
Kled was alluded to in the Jinx and Ziggs comic.

When the people of Piltover realized that Ziggs was a yordle, they were afraid of him because they thought he was a Noxian weapon like the kind they used in Ionia. This points to Kled being involved in the Noxian invasion of Ionia.

Which he himself alludes to in his quotes "[Invade Ionia you said, it would be fine you said](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/a/a3/Kled.moveMount53.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20160729193125)... **_[FINE YOU SAID](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/3f/Kled.moveMount54.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20160729193125)_** !"
He says that?  I feel like listening to all of Kled's quotes now
Kled is a figment of his own imagination.
Because a lot of champions aren't in the lore of others.

Three reasons
1: He's relatively new to the lore
2: As stated before, he's isolationist, and does not want to make contact with other champions
3: People seem to believe him to be little more than a myth, as with most Yordles, further limiting contact

Kled wants to be left alone, so we probably won't see much more lore on him, if at all
I still find people talking about the "lore" in this game funny.
